	\begin{tikzpicture}
	
	
	\begin{axis}[
	% xmajorticks=false,
	width=0.8\textwidth,
	height=0.2\textwidth,
	xtick={0,48,...,336},
	ytick={10000,30000},
	ylabel = CO,
	scatter/classes={%
		0={mark=none},%
		1={mark=*,orange!75},%
		c={mark=triangle*,draw=red,mark size=3,red}},
	name=plot1]
	\addplot[smooth,blue!75] table [x={timestamp}, y={co}] {\resultTable};
	\addplot[scatter,only marks,scatter src=explicit symbolic, mark size=1.2]
	table[x={timestamp}, y={co}, meta={label1}]{\resultTable};
	\end{axis}
	
	\begin{axis}[
	% xmajorticks=false,
	width=0.8\textwidth,
	height=0.2\textwidth,
	xtick={0,48,...,336},
	ytick={0,20,...,100},
	ylabel = Humidity,
	name=plot2,
	scatter/classes={%
		0={mark=none},%
		1={mark=*,orange!75},%
		c={mark=triangle*,draw=red,mark size=3,red}},
	at=(plot1.below south west), 
	anchor=above north west]
	\addplot[smooth,blue!75] table [x={timestamp}, y={hu}] {\resultTable};
	\addplot[scatter,only marks,scatter src=explicit symbolic, mark size=1.2]
	table[x={timestamp}, y={hu}, meta={label2}]{\resultTable};
	\draw[dashed] ({axis cs:96,30}|-{rel axis cs:0,1}) -- ({axis cs:96,60}|-{rel axis cs:0,0});
	
	\draw[-latex,dashed,orange!75] ({axis cs:7,52}) -- ({axis cs:96,52});
	\draw[-latex,dashed,orange!75] ({axis cs:16,36}) -- ({axis cs:96,36});

	\begin{axis}[
	% xmajorticks=false,
	width=0.8\textwidth,
	height=0.2\textwidth,
	xtick={0,48,...,336},
	ytick={0,40,80},
	ylabel = NO\textsubscript{2},
	name=plot3,
	scatter/classes={%
		0={mark=none},%
		1={mark=*,orange!75},%
		c={mark=triangle*,draw=red,mark size=3,red}},
	at=(plot2.below south west), 
	anchor=above north west]
	\addplot[smooth,blue!75] table [x={timestamp}, y={no2}] {\resultTable};
	\addplot[scatter,only marks,scatter src=explicit symbolic, mark size=1.2]
	table[x={timestamp}, y={no2}, meta={label3}]{\resultTable};
	\end{axis}    
	
	\begin{axis}[
	legend entries={Event sequence, Crawl time},
	legend style={draw=none,at={(0.1,-0.2)},anchor=north},
	width=0.8\textwidth,
	height=0.2\textwidth,
	xtick={0,48,...,336},
	ytick={10,20,30},
	name=plot4,
	ylabel = Temperature,
	xlabel = Timeline (30 min as 1 unit),
	scatter/classes={%
		0={mark=none},%
		1={mark=*,orange!75},%
		c={mark=triangle*,draw=red,mark size=3,red}},
	at=(plot3.below south west), 
	anchor=above north west]
	\addlegendimage{only marks, mark=*,orange}
	\addlegendimage{only marks, mark=triangle*}
	\addplot[smooth,blue!75] table [x={timestamp}, y={temp}] {\resultTable};
	\addplot[scatter,only marks,scatter src=explicit symbolic, mark size=1.2]
	table[x={timestamp}, y={temp}, meta={label4}]{\resultTable};
	\end{axis}
	\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
